summary: REQ-39 is mostly implemented in App.tsx for landingMessage and videoSlots defaults (headings + unchanged URLs) and REQ-40 comments are present, but the finalMessage default does not exactly match the required multiline text (uses straight apostrophes instead of curly apostrophes), which violates the “set exactly” requirement. Additionally, non-requested metadata files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Set `finalMessage` default exactly to the provided multiline text (including curly apostrophes and line breaks).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the finalMessage initializer text differs from the required string: it uses straight apostrophes (e.g., "Valentine's", "I've", "I'm", "I'd") instead of the specified curly apostrophes (e.g., "Valentine’s", "I’ve", "I’m", "I’d"). Because the requirement says "set exactly", this is not fully implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained a generated/metadata summary file describing frontend files.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to modify `frontend/src/App.tsx` initial default state values and add inline comments. Modifying this summary file is not requested.
The BuildRequest does not request any changes to project tracking/metadata files; only `frontend/src/App.tsx` default state initializers and comments were in scope.
